sentences.english: She is then serenaded by all the married women .
sentences.chinese: 然後由所有的已婚婦女爲新娘唱夜曲。

sentences.english: The married patient hopes to conceive after completing a test tube baby programme.
sentences.chinese: 已婚的德亞希望試管嬰兒項目完成後自己能懷孕。

sentences.english: She is then serenaded by all the married women.
sentences.chinese: 然後由全部的已婚婦女爲新娘唱小夜曲。

sentences.english: Not one penny should be spent for a circlet of gold to testify that we are married.
sentences.chinese: 我們不應耗費分文去買金環來證明我們已婚的身份。

sentences.english: A married man may have his hands full if he has han-ky panky going on.
sentences.chinese: 已婚男人如果有其它男女關係，一定也很忙碌。

sentences.english: After all, many transvestites are married and have children.
sentences.chinese: 畢竟，許多易裝癖者已婚並有孩子。

sentences.english: Oh, did I mention that Gongquan was already married?
sentences.chinese: 哦，我提到過王功權早就是已婚人士了嗎？

sentences.english: A group of about 30 women are sitting on a large jute mat.
sentences.chinese: 大約三十個已婚婦女坐在一塊巨大的麻草墊上。

sentences.english: As a married man, I was hopi ng to be a good husband.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一個已婚男子，我希望成爲一個好丈夫。

sentences.english: To fill you in a bit, Wang is a successful, married businessman.
sentences.chinese: 要說明的是，王功權是一位已婚的成功商人。

sentences.english: He cheated her into marrying a rich married man.
sentences.chinese: 他誘騙她嫁給一個有錢的已婚男子。

sentences.english: Consequently, you’ll meet Asian girls in clubs who are married.
sentences.chinese: 因此，在俱樂部你會碰到已婚的亞洲女人。

sentences.english: The scandalous behavior of this married woman shocked her friends.
sentences.chinese: 這個已婚女人的誹謗性行爲震驚了她的朋友。

sentences.english: This comedy centers around the married couple Harvey and Gillian .
sentences.chinese: 這喜劇中心的已婚夫婦哈維和吉莉安。

sentences.english: Mi-hee, who is currently dating a married man, feels attraction to men who are in relationships.
sentences.chinese: 美熙，誰是目前跟已婚男人約會，很吸引人的關係。

definition: to marry for the second time/second marriage/second spouse
older (than average in a group, at school, for marriage etc)
to get married and have kids/to start a family
